name: Auburn National Bancorporation, Inc.
description: Auburn National Bancorporation, Inc. is a financial services holding company based in Auburn, Alabama. Established in 1903, the company is dedicated to providing a range of banking and financial services through its wholly-owned subsidiary, AuburnBank. AuburnBank offers a variety of services including personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions. With a strong focus on community involvement and customer service, Auburn National Bancorporation strives to meet the financial needs of individuals and businesses in its local markets. The bank prides itself on its commitment to building long-lasting relationships with customers while supporting local initiatives and economic development. As a community bank, Auburn National Bancorporation emphasizes personalized service and accessibility, ensuring that clients can rely on their banking needs being met with care and attention. The company continues to adapt to changes in the financial landscape, leveraging technology to enhance customer experience while maintaining its core values of integrity, service, and community engagement.

seo.meta_title: Auburn National Bancorporation, Inc. | Community Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Auburn National Bancorporation, a community bank in Alabama committed to providing personalized banking and financial services. Learn about our products and services.

faq.question: What services does Auburn Bank offer?
faq.answer: Auburn Bank offers personal banking, business banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Auburn National Bancorporation headquartered?
faq.answer: Auburn National Bancorporation is headquartered in Auburn, Alabama, USA.

faq.question: When was Auburn National Bancorporation founded?
faq.answer: Auburn National Bancorporation was founded in 1903.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Auburn National Bancorporation?
faq.answer: Robert D. Eason is the CEO of Auburn National Bancorporation.
